title: The Science of Telepathy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/6/20
itunes:title: The Science of Telepathy - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/6/20
description:
George Noory and author Marty Rosenblatt explore his research into telepathy and pre-cognition, and how some people can increase their psychic powers to remote view the future and even predict the outcomes of sporting events and the stock market.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
